From: " - • • " 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Epstein Bail Statement 
Date: Wed, 17 Jul 2019 23:19:41 +0000 
Not 
necessary. I'm not wedded to it. 
On Jul 
17, 2019, at 6:47 PM, vrote: 
I'm not sure if they feel it's a litigation risk or that it just looks bad, but we can regroup with them tomorrow to 
clarify and get back to you. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 17, 2019, at 6:41 PM, Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS) 
> 
wrote: 
Ok, but we are missing an 
opportunity. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 17, 2019 6:40 PM 
To: Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS) •clM> 
Cc: 
: e.. MI•iIPtement 
I think mainly that it's not our usual practice. And that we stated on the record Monday that we've already had "many 
responses" to the tip line and dramatically widened our investigation as a result. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 17, 2019, at 6:34 PM, Berman, Geoffrey 
(USANYS) 
c  
wrote: 
What's their concern? 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 17, 2019 5:17 PM 
To: Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS) 
Cc: 
Subject: Epstein Bail Statement 
We 
conferred with 
and• they expressed misgivings about making any statements regarding detention and 
at this point, we agree. 
EFTA00022522
